data.text: Fiscal support has prevented a more severe economic recession & larger job losses. But, such support, along w drops in revenues, has raised govt deficits & debt to unprecedented levels. The #FiscalMonitor offers advice on how to strike the right balance. https://t.co/XlxFM8qVWZ https://t.co/MF86hQYyBo

What are the most important lessons we can learn from the pandemic? We asked Vitor Gaspar, Director of the Fiscal Affairs Department. Learn more on our #IMFblog https://t.co/0845p3ZgXZ
#FiscalMonitor https://t.co/erExWSNz0C

JUST RELEASED: The new #FiscalMonitor discusses how governments should tailor fiscal policy to 
✔️Get ahead of the pandemic
✔️Protect the most vulnerable people & firms 
✔️Set the stage for a greener, fairer, and more durable recovery.
